categories.name: Timesheet management
categories.description: Permissions for approving, managing, and exporting employee timesheets.

permissions.name: In assigned areas
permissions.description: For lower level employees in assigned areas at locations they manage, allow user to approve time in timesheets.

permissions.name: In assigned areas, for all roles
permissions.description: For all employees in areas users manages, allow user to approve time in timesheets. Enables user to approve own timesheets.

permissions.name: In all areas
permissions.description: For lower level employees in all areas at locations they manage, allow user to approve time in timesheets.
